TraitInfo.Help: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Free Great Prophet when researching a religion.
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain chance to abduct enemy units as slaves.
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gains a unit when spreading state religion.
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Doubles spawn chance and capacity of [COLOR_GREEN]Planar Gates[COLOR_REVERT].
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vampires automatically become members of the Black Court.
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vampires automatically become members of the Red Court.
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Vampires automatically become members of the White Court.
